content.rendered:
Nanny Jobs in the United States City and Tri-State Area

Enthusiastic, knowledgable, empathetic, a finger on the pulse, ability to stay ten steps ahead, eyes in the back of your head, proactive, and playtime expert? You’re in the right place. We are always seeking City Savvy Nannies for United States’s beloved families. Apply today and begin the first steps towards finding your dream family.

Applicant Requirements:

  • Be at least 21 years of age.
  • Have a minimum of 5 years of private in-home childcare experience.
  • Provide phone and email information for 2 recent childcare employment references.
  • Provide current US work authorization for W2 employment.
  • Able to make a minimum 1-year commitment.
Position Type
Schedule
Living Situation
Location

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Tribeca, 2 Children

A fun and active family in Tribeca are searching for a Nanny for their 7 and 5-year-old sons. Driving is required. Swimming and the Spanish language are nice ‘pluses’ . Strong English is prioritized over a 2nd language.

Position Number: 1726

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Brooklyn, NY, 4 Children

A wonderful family in Brooklyn is on the lookout for an awesome nanny to become a part of their warm and friendly household. Your role will involve caring for their three lovely daughters and their eagerly awaited new baby boy, who’s due to arrive in January next year!

Position Number: 1681

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Brooklyn, NY, 2 Children

A young Brooklyn family with dual working parents seek a loving, experienced, and highly engaged Nanny for two bouncing boys aged 4.5 and 2.5yrs old.

Position Number: 1685

Status: Filled

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, LWS, NY, 1 Child

Lovely first-time parents on the LWS (Washington Sq Park area) seek a wonderful Nanny for their 5-month-old daughter beginning early October as their NCS moves on, and both resume work. Ability to both swim and a drive would be great pluses. Ability to offer French language immersion, an amazing bonus! None are dealbreakers if all else aligns. The very best person for the family is the #1 priority.

Position Number: 1687

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, UES, NY, 2 Children

A wonderful UES-based family is eagerly searching for a warm-hearted and caring nanny to provide loving care for their two adorable daughters, aged 3.5 years and 17 months, beginning in October.

Position Number: 1686

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out/Live-In Nanny, SOHO, NY, 2 Children

A friendly and outgoing young family in SOHO are seeking a nanny to support with them in raising their adorable 2.5-year-old daughter and her new baby brother just 7 months old.

Position Number: 1683

Status: Active

Learn More

Part-time, Live-out Nanny, UES, NY 2 Children

Busy working physician parents on the UES (East End Ave) are seeking a kind, loving, reliable and knowledgeable part-time Nanny for the school year thru the end of June. Duties would resume in Sept. You’ll help care for their 5-year-old daughter and sweet, sporty older brother aged 10.

Position Number: 1692

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, TriBeCa, NY 2 Children

A kind, communicative and engaging Nanny would be a super fit for this lovely Tribeca family of (almost) four. The families 8-year-old daughter will soon be joined by a new baby sister due right around Thanksgiving, and she is incredibly excited for her arrival!

Position Number: 1689

Status: Filled

Learn More

Weekend, Live-out/ Live-in Nanny, Montclair, NJ 1 Child

A family in Montclair, NJ seeks a warm, loving, and supportive weekend nanny to care for their adorable and super active 4-year-old boy.

Position Number: 1688

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Long Island, NY 2 Children

A wonderful family located in Bay Shore is seeking a compassionate and dependable nanny to assist in the care of their charming 3.5-year-old and 9-month-old sons.

Position Number: 1695

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Brooklyn Heights, NY 2 Children

A fun and active family in Brooklyn Heights is searching for a Nanny for their 7-year-old boy/girl twins for a back to school start. These parents will have your back, provide what you need to do your job well, and offer collaboration and a teamwork vibe!

Position Number: 1697

Status: Filled

Learn More

12-week, Live-out NCS, Brooklyn, NY 1 Child

An exciting opportunity awaits in Brooklyn for first-time parents eagerly anticipating the arrival of their baby daughter this November!

Position Number: 1699

Status: Filled

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out/ Live-in Nanny & Family Assistant, Brooklyn, NY 2 Children

A terrific Brooklyn-based family seeks a big-hearted, playful Nanny & Family Assistant for their 7-year-old son and his 3-year-old sister.

Position Number: 1694

Status: Filled

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Manhattan, NY 2 Children

A wonderful young family on the UES of Manhattan is in search of a committed nanny to provide loving care to their two adorable boys, ages 4 years old and 3 months old.

Position Number: 1701

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Manhattan, NY 2 Children

A downtown NYC based family of 4 is in search of a warm and reliable nanny to care for their newborn and almost 2-year-old for an early December Start!

Position Number: 1696

Status: Active

Full-time, Live-in Rotational Nanny, SOHO, NY 1 Child

A dynamic young couple in SOHO are in search of two exceptional live-in rotational nannies to provide care to their adorable 1-year-old daughter.

Position Number: 1707

Status: Active

Full-time, Live-out Nanny/Family Assistant, Manhattan, NY 2 Children

A lovely family in Manhattan is looking for a Hungarian speaking nanny/family assistant to help care for their two sweet children.

Position Number: 1705

Status: Filled

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Lower Manhattan, NY 2 Children

A truly kind & thoughtful family in Lower Manhattan are seeking a lovely nanny to support them in caring for their delightful boys aged 2-years, & just 2-months old.

Status: Position Filled

A busy household on the UES seeks a professional nanny for their elementary aged child, 4 days per week. Must be within a 30 minute commute of the UES for consideration.

Status: Filled

Status: Active

Status: Filled

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, UES, NY 1 Child

A lovely family on the UES of Manhattan are seeking their first nanny to nurture and care for their 5-month-old daughter beginning in early January. They hope you’ll be seeking at least a 2-year commitment as there’s potential to grow their family.

Position Number: 1704

Status: Filled

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, UES, NY 3 Children

A dynamic, fun family on the Upper East Side is seeking a nanny to provide support and care for their three terrific children aged 9, 7, and 5 years old. The position begins in early January.

Status: Filled

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Manhattan, NY 2 Children

A lovely young family on the UES of NYC seeks a fab nanny to partner and support them in raising their two awesome kiddos, big sis, age 5 and baby brother, just 6 months old.

Position Number: 1711

Status: Filled

Learn More

Full-time, Live-out Nanny, Brooklyn, NY 1 Child

A lovely young family in Brooklyn are seeking an experienced nanny to partner with them in raising their precious 6-week-old baby girl, beginning in February, with the option to start sooner.

Status: Active

Full-time, Live-in Rotational Nanny, Manhattan, NY 2 Children

A downtown family seek a big-hearted nanny for their 3-year-old little girl and her darling 2-year-old brother. Experience with special needs, and fluency in Mandarin or Spanish is a huge plus.

Position Number: 1714

Status: Active

Learn More

Status: Active

Learn More

A mom on the UWS needs the support of a terrific nanny to help her care for her 2.5-year-old son. Interviews start ASAP! Mom and Dad live separately but close by, and the child transitions between their homes. Childcare is in mom's home though you’ll help pick up and drop off between both parent's homes.

Position Number: 1718

Status: Active

Learn More

Full-time, Temporary, Live-out Nanny, UES, NY 1 Child

A lovely young family on the UES is seeking an infant-experienced, temporary, full-time nanny to care for their 4-month-old son. The position begins in late February or early March as is a 3-month contract. The child will begin attending daycare in June

Position Number: 1698
